body: It is not possible to implement the update step of RProp using the GPU implementation (of the operations) of TensorFlow and Eigen-Tensor in a trivial or efficient way, therefore we use CudaLaunchConfig to determine the launch parameters (of the GPU hardware) in order to execute the CUDA kernel that computes the update step.
body_html: It is not possible to implement the update step of RProp using the GPU implementation (of the operations) of TensorFlow and Eigen-Tensor in a trivial or efficient way, therefore we use CudaLaunchConfig to determine the launch parameters (of the GPU hardware) in order to execute the CUDA kernel that computes the update step.
body_text: It is not possible to implement the update step of RProp using the GPU implementation (of the operations) of TensorFlow and Eigen-Tensor in a trivial or efficient way, therefore we use CudaLaunchConfig to determine the launch parameters (of the GPU hardware) in order to execute the CUDA kernel that computes the update step.
